modName: Creation Kit Fix --- All DLCs plus Multiple Masters
summary: I reinstall skyrim alot, and I get tired of having to edit the SkyrimEditor.ini every time (Read download http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25146/? manual version and add the line [General] bAllowMultipleMasterLoads=1)
descriptionHtml:
I reinstall skyrim alot, and I get tired of having to edit the SkyrimEditor.ini every time (Read: download [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25146/]Creation kit fixer - Dawnguard - Hearthfire - Dragonborn DLCs[/url] manual version and add the line [General] bAllowMultipleMasterLoads=1)

So for my convenience and others I decided to post my edited version of the file to the Nexus.

This mod modifies one file (SkyrimEditor.ini) And fixes it so that the creation kit can load all three DLCs + handle multiple masters. Thats it. 

Requirements: Skyrim, All DLCs and (duh) The Creation Kit.

How to install: Just drop it into the main 'Skyrim' folder (not the data subfolder) and poof! Your done. If you have the Creation Kit open at the time, you will have to exit and restart the program for the change to take effect.

Credits go to 
 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4200080]EdenGallant[/url] - who made Creation kit fixer - Dawnguard - Hearthfire - Dragonborn DLCs ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25146/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25146/[/url]) I just added one line to the top of the manual version of his file, ([General] bAllowMultipleMasterLoads=1) so it would allow multiple masters too.

>Prod80 - who posted the above line for me to copy from and paste into the file. ( [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1010475-running-multiple-master-files-in-creation-kit/]http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1010475-running-multiple-master-files-in-creation-kit/[/url] )
author: Randerzo

files.name: Creation Kit Fixer All DLCs plus support multiple masters
